About the Company: Pearl Electronics Group Co., Limited (Pearl Group) was established with the vision of becoming the largest manufacturer of VoIP network and LED lightings. The head office locates in Hong Kong and the manufactory is in Zhongshan/Shenzhen/Huizhou/Taiwan. Pearl Group has been a quality electronic manufacturing services manufacturer in China. We have recorded significant growth in annual sales growth every year since establishment
